title: Tuning Function Block
description:
TUNE sets, using up and down buttons, an output signal Y. By correspon￾ding setup variables, the increment will be programmed individually. An
upper and lower limit for the output Y can be specifed by LIMIT_L and LI￾MIT_H . with the buttons SU and SD up or down steps are generated. If a
key is held down longer than the time T1, then the output Y is continuously
adjusted up or down. The speed, which with the output is adjusted here, is
given by S1. S1 and S2 indicate the units per second. Is a button held
down longer than the time T2, the device automatically switches to a se￾cond speed S2. With the inputs RST and SET the output can at any time be
adjusted by RST_VAL resp. SET_VAL to a predetermined value.
name: TUNE

input.name: SET
input.description: A boolean flag to set the value of Y to SET_val.

input.name: SU
input.description: A boolean flag indicating a request to increment the value of Y slowly.

input.name: SD
input.description: A boolean flag indicating a request to decrement the value of Y slowly.

input.name: RST
input.description: A boolean flag to reset the value of Y to RST_val.

input.name: SS
input.description: A real number representing the step size for slow adjustments, default value is 0.1.

input.name: Limit_L
input.description: The lower limit for the output value Y.

input.name: LIMIT_H
input.description: The upper limit for the output value Y, default value is 100.0.

input.name: RST_val
input.description: The value to set Y to when RST is true.

input.name: SET_val
input.description: The value to set Y to when SET is true, default value is 100.0.

input.name: T1
input.description: The duration for the slow ramp operation, default value is 500 ms.

input.name: T2
input.description: The duration for the fast ramp operation, default value is 2 s.

input.name: S1
input.description: The step size for the slow ramp up operation, default value is 2.0.

input.name: S2
input.description: The step size for the fast ramp up operation, default value is 10.0.

output.name: Y
output.description: The output value that is adjusted based on the input states and limits.
